Reviews.Title: Head-Ups Videographers!
Reviews.Author: Denise Scott Jackson
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe the professional results in such a compact SLR. In my line of work you lug around a lot of equipment, so anything that's lightweight – and yet virtually indestructible – is welcomed. This top-of-the-line professional-grade camera won't disappoint. The GH3 comes with all my favourite features I've come to enjoy with my little compact Lumix LX-7, as well as many more automatic and manual settings; too numerous to mention. Read what the pros say about this camera and why videographers, cinematographers, and the low-budget filmmaking community in general, have added the GH3 into their equipment inventory. <http://philipbloom.net/2012/09/15/genesis>
